title: Between the Sheets Recipe
full_text:
Between the Sheets Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
1 min
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
3/4
ounce
cognac
3/4
ounce
light rum
(or aged rum if you prefer)
3/4
ounce
Cointreau
1/2
ounce
fresh lemon juice
Directions
Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake well until chilled, about 10 seconds. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.
Special equipment
Cocktail shaker, cocktail strainer
Rum
Brandy & Cognac
